Talk03_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_01>Don't be ridiculous!<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>The pirates are really dangerous!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


Losing my hometown was enough, but
losing you too? Not an option.
Talk03_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Oh, it looks like your pouch is still full.


I want you to have a <clr:0000>mighty salt-grilled
crab <clr:ffff>I brought from our hometown.

Please come back once you've made
some space.
Talk03_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>That <clr:0000>mighty salt-grilled crab<clr:ffff> is my
finest cooking.

It's a dish that really brings out the
warrior in you. Please, enjoy!
Talk03_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_01>Don't be ridiculous.


With Lurelin<clr:0000> restored<clr:ffff>, we villagers need to
come together and bring life back to our
once-bustling little village.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>I can take care of the shop here,
no problem.

You should get the village shop opened,
pronto, and start saving money too.
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_01><clr:0000>Rozel<clr:ffff>'s the <clr:0000>head of the village<clr:ffff>—I bet he'd
know whether or not everyone is safe.
Talk03_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>The pirates are already gone?!


<sp:0:2:2:6400>And Rozel and everyone from the village
are OK too?!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk03_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_01>You're right. Let's keep the business here
rolling until the village is back to normal.
Talk02_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Sorry you overheard all that...


You see, our hometown is a place called
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>. It's a fishing village on the
<clr:0000>southeastern edge <clr:ffff>of Hyrule.
It's a small place, but our little village
had specialty shops you can't find
anywhere else.
People would travel great distances
just to visit the shops. It was a very
lively place...
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>But then it was attacked by pirates.
I hope everyone is all right...

<clr:0000>Rozel<clr:ffff>'s the <clr:0000>head of the village<clr:ffff>—surely 
he'd know how everyone fared.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>But it's so far from here, and
we've got no way to contact him.
We're beside ourselves.
Talk03_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Thank goodness! <sp:5:1:0>I'm so glad. They're all
safe. I was beside myself...
Talk03_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>With the pirates gone and the village back
to normal, I have to wonder how our little
shop back home is looking...
Even if I have to go on my own, maybe
I should return to Lurelin Village.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>But if you'd be lonely without me, then I
can stay here, Mubs...
Talk03_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Thank you for bringing us the best
possible news!
Talk03_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL_00>Please, have this, as a sign of
our gratitude.
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>I'm worried about everyone back home in
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>. I keep hoping they got
away from the <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>...
Talk02_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Sorry. We were deep in conversation.
But enough about that!
Talk03_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00>With the pirates gone, I have to wonder
how our little shop back home is looking...

Even if I have to go on my own, maybe
I should return to Lurelin Village.
Talk01_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>Me too... We're so fortunate to have
refuge here. I can't say the same for
everyone else...
The village is way out on the <clr:0000>edge of East
Necluda<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>, and there's
nowhere nearby for them to run to...
Talk02_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>There's no nearby place around
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village <clr:ffff>where folks would
be able to seek refuge, you see.
Talk03_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_01>Even with the pirates out of the picture,
there's work to be done.

They're going to be busy for a while,
<clr:0000>rebuilding<clr:ffff> the houses and shops.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Without any woodworking skills, you'd
just get in the way if you went back now.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Instead, we should focus on saving up
money in the meantime.

<snd:TalkPositive_01>That way, once the village is <clr:0000>restored<clr:ffff>,
we'll have the means to reopen our
shop there!
Talk01_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_00><clr:0000>Rozel<clr:ffff>'s the <clr:0000>village leader<clr:ffff>, so he'd be
the first to know how things shook out
back home.
But we've got no way to reach him...
Never thought something like this would
happen in our peaceful little <clr:0000>hometown<clr:ffff>...
Talk02_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>I can't stop worrying about everyone back
at home...
Talk03_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_00>Good call, yeah...


<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000>Though, I'd have preferred to stay with you a
while longer...<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>OK, I'll make my way to Lurelin Village.
Leave the village shop to me!
Talk02_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Sorry. We were deep in conversation.


We didn't expect any customers at this
hour. But enough about that!
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>I'm worried sick about everyone in
Lurelin Village...

Hey, maybe I should head back there and
scope out the situation?
Talk03_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Oh, looks like your pouch is full and you
can't fit any more!

I had been hoping <sp:5:0:0>to give you a <clr:0000>mighty
salt-grilled crab<clr:ffff> that I brought from
our hometown.
But if you don't have room, I can't offer
you this gift.
Talk01_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>You must have overheard the bad news...
But enough about that!
Talk02_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Sorry. We were deep in conversation.


We didn't expect any customers at this
hour. But let me greet you properly!
Talk03_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah, a customer! Sorry about that. We
were caught up in conversation.
Talk03_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>To top it off, the ruined buildings have all
been restored?!
Talk03_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Everyone in the village is OK?! You...<sp:5:1:0>you<sp:5:1:0>
spoke to Rozel?
Talk01_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>You must have overheard the bad news...


We were speaking freely because we
didn't figure any customers would come
by at this hour. But enough about that!
Talk03_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_00>Thank goodness! Just hearing that
everyone is all right is enough for me.

The village and houses can all be rebuilt,
but there's no replacing the people.

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Still, I can't imagine how they're all
feeling, with no homes to return to...

<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:WorkHeavy_01>How long do those no-good pirates plan
on staying there?
Talk01_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>You must have overheard the bad news...


We were speaking freely because we
didn't figure any customers would come
by at this hour. But enough about that!
Talk03_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>All we can do now is hope that
those pirates leave Lurelin Village
at some point.
<clr:0000>Our shop<clr:ffff> is there too... I wonder what's
become of it.
